blogPost.title: How can parents help their children not fall behind in school? Answer by @KathrynStarke, Literacy Consultant, Author, Founder of The Starke School. https://t.co/EMTDFN1rSw https://t.co/0nc7ixcP3f
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 子供が学校で遅れを取らないようにするには、親はどうすればいいですか？Answer by @KathrynStarke, Literacy Consultant, Author, Founder of The Starke School. https://t.co/EMTDFN1rSw https://t.co/0nc7ixcP3f
父母如何帮助他们的孩子不在学校里落后？回答者：@KathrynStarke，识字顾问、作家、Starke学校的创始人。https://t.co/EMTDFN1rSw https://t.co/0nc7ixcP3f
父母如何幫助他們的孩子不在學校裏落後？回答者：@KathrynStarke，識字顧問、作家、Starke學校的創始人。https://t.co/EMTDFN1rSw https://t.co/0nc7ixcP3f

previous.title: Why is speech recognition an important tool for kids? Answer by @ScanlonPatricia, Founder/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/7Juqa1Ch2I https://t.co/QfwWU0AJBd

localize.full_text: なぜ音声認識は子供にとって重要なツールなのでしょうか？Answer by @ScanlonPatricia, Founder/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/7Juqa1Ch2I https://t.co/QfwWU0AJBd
为什么语音识别是儿童的重要工具？回答者：@ScanlonPatricia, 创始人/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/7Juqa1Ch2I https://t.co/QfwWU0AJBd
爲什麼語音識別是兒童的重要工具？回答者：@ScanlonPatricia, 創始人/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/7Juqa1Ch2I https://t.co/QfwWU0AJBd

next.title: Why is diversity a benefit for companies? Answer by Marjorie Janiewicz (@Toucas), Senior Vice President, HackerOne. https://t.co/LorHvMoUd6 https://t.co/9ico6Xx3iM

localize.full_text: ダイバーシティはなぜ企業にとってメリットがあるのでしょうか？HackerOne上級副社長のMarjorie Janiewicz（@Toucas）さんの回答です。https://t.co/LorHvMoUd6 https://t.co/9ico6Xx3iM
为什么多样性对公司来说是一种好处？HackerOne高级副总裁Marjorie Janiewicz（@Toucas）的回答。https://t.co/LorHvMoUd6 https://t.co/9ico6Xx3iM
爲什麼多樣性對公司來說是一種好處？HackerOne高級副總裁Marjorie Janiewicz（@Toucas）的回答。https://t.co/LorHvMoUd6 https://t.co/9ico6Xx3iM
